properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}1. With harps and with viols there stand a great throng In the presence of Jesus and sing this new song{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unto Him who hath loved us and washed us from sin Unto Him be the glory forever Amen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}2. All these once were sinners, defiled in His sight Now arrayed in pure garments in praise they unite{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unto Him who hath loved us and washed us from sin Unto Him be the glory forever Amen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}3. He maketh the rebel a priest and a king He hath bought us and taught us this new song to sing{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unto Him who hath loved us and washed us from sin Unto Him be the glory forever Amen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}4. How helpless and hopeless we sinners had been If He never had loved us till cleansed from our sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unto Him who hath loved us and washed us from sin Unto Him be the glory forever Amen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}5. Aloud in His praises our voices shall ring So that others believing, this new song shall sing 10. Unto Him who hath loved us and washed us from sin Unto Him be the glory forever Amen{/lang-eng}
